General.Name: Pehuenche
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Empresa Eléctrica Pehuenche S.A. engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and supply of electricity; and the construction of hydroelectric power plants in Chile. It owns and operates three hydroelectric plants in Pehuenche, Curillinque, and Loma Alta. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Empresa Eléctrica Pehuenche S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Enel Generación Chile S.A.
General.Address: Santa Rosa 76, Santiago de Chile, Chile, 8330099
